original_text: Alexander, the man who makes things from metal, caused a lot of trouble for me. The Lord will punish him because of the wrong things that he did.
korean_text: 구리 세공업자 알렉산더가 내게 해를 많이 입혔으매 주께서 그 행한 대로 그에게 갚으시리니

sentences.original_text: Alexander, the man who makes things from metal,
sentences.korean_translation: 알렉산더, 금속으로 물건을 만드는 그 사람은,

sentences.original_text: caused a lot of trouble for me.
because of the wrong things that he did.
